string-array.name: tutbody_array
string-array.item: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all. - Oscar Wilde
The proper function of man is to live, not to exist. I shall not waste my days in trying to prolong them. I shall use my time. - Jack London
Time is all you have. And you may find one day that you have less than you think. - Randy Pausch
Time is a precious thing. Never waste it. - Gene Wilder

string-array.name: tuttitle_array
string-array.item: Where Are You Enjoying Life Right Now?
Which Type of Body Are You Living In?
